body.descripcion_1: I am Diego Emilio Garza GudiÃ±o, a full stack web developer focused on frontend development, constantly learning new technologies and best practices to build modern, fast, accessible, and secure websites.
body.descripcion_2: I am passionate about optimizing website performance and ensuring an intuitive and accessible user experience for the widest possible audience.
body.descripcion_3: I also hold certifications in Linux operating systems and training as a SOC Analyst (HTB), which gives me a comprehensive perspective on cybersecurity and the infrastructure behind web applications.
body.descripcion_4: My English level is B2, and I am currently learning German.
body.descripcion_5: I am committed to continuous improvement, constant learning, and the development of technological solutions that make a real difference.
